titleStmt.title: The petition of the Lords and Commons of England, now assembled in Parliament: presented to the Kings most excellent Majestie with the remonstrance. Concerning the present state of this kingdome.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Lacks an official order to print.
Printers' device on t.p. not found in McK.: lozenge with pellican and young, motto in rim, "Aspicis vt vivnnt [sic] pellicani sangvine pvlli sic christo effuso sangvine vivis homo".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
